name: Sysinternals SDelete Registry Keys
description: A General detection to trigger for the creation or modification of .*\Software\Sysinternals\SDelete registry keys. Indicators of the use of Sysinternals SDelete tool.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:CreateKey AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Sysinternals\\SDelete*)`
